trans-unit.source: Contains a list of selectable items.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en liste med elementer som kan velges.

trans-unit.source: ListBox is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: Liste er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, som betyr at den kan inneholde en samling objekter av en annen type (for eksempel streng, image eller panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: More than one item in a ListBox is visible, unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, which has only the selected item visible unless the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Mer enn ett element i en liste er synlig, i motsetning til det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, som har bare det valgte elementet vises med mindre den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property determines whether more than one item in the ListBox is selectable at a time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen bestemmer om mer enn ett element i liste valgbar om gangen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property determines how many items a user can select at one time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen bestemmer hvor mange elementer en bruker kan velge om gangen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode> (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>(standard), <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: The following table described the behavior of these enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskrives virkemåten for disse nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>|The user can select only one item at a time.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>|The user can select multiple items without holding down a modifier key.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>|The user can select multiple consecutive items while holding down the SHIFT key or non-consecutive items by holding down the CTRL key and clicking the items.| ListBox controls are often used with data binding.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>| Brukeren kan velge bare ett element om gangen. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>| Brukeren kan velge flere elementer uten å holde nede modifikator. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>| Brukeren kan velge flere etterfølgende elementer mens du holder du nede SKIFT eller ikke-påfølgende elementer ved å holde nede CTRL-tasten og klikker elementene. | Kontroller liste brukes ofte med databinding.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Data Binding oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Visning av et stort antall elementer, kan det føre ytelsesproblemer.

trans-unit.source: See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [optimalisere ytelsen: Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ListBox Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ListBox controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasse liste kontrollen til i gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere liste kontroller, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>slik at kontrollen en unik virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ListBox, see [ListBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for listen, kan du se [liste stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ListBox control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i liste kontrollens standardmalen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item that is initially selected when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*> is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir elementet som i utgangspunktet valgt når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>er <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: The item that is initially selected when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*> is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som i utgangspunktet valgt når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>er <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Creates or identifies the element used to display a specified item.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter eller identifiserer elementet brukes til å vise et element som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The element used to display a specified item.
trans-unit.target: Elementet brukes til å vise et element som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref> supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref> støtter rulling.

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, HandlesScrolling should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen har en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>i malen og har et egendefinert tastatur rulling virkemåte for HandlesScrolling skal returnere `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref> supports scrolling; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref> støtter rulling; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own `ItemContainer`.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte elementet er (berettiget til å være) sin egen `ItemContainer`.

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: Angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is its own <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet er et eget <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Gir en riktig <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref> implementering for kontrollen som en del av den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Typespesifikke <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementering.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsMouseCaptured*>

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarer på den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref> reports a mouse move.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref> en musen move-rapporter.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a list box selection change by raising a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarer til en listevalg for endre ved å heve en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder det angitte elementet til å vise det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder elementet kan omfatte bruker stiler innstillingen bindinger, og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som brukes til å vise det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: Angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Causes the object to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: Får objektet til å bla til visningen.

trans-unit.source: If the object is not visible, it is aligned at the top or bottom of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Hvis objektet ikke er synlig, justeres den øverst eller bunnen av VISNINGSPORTEN.

trans-unit.source: Object to scroll.
trans-unit.target: Objekt for å rulle.

trans-unit.source: Selects all the items in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Velger alle elementene i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: Henter de valgte elementene.

trans-unit.source: This property is meant to be used when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> does not equal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ment å være brukes når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>er ikke lik <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the selection mode is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode> the correct property to use is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis valgmodusen er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>riktig til å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of the currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling av de valgte elementene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectedItems*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectedItems*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selection behavior for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir merkingen for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"></xref> selection.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionMode"> </xref> utvalget.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Sets a collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: Angir en samling for de valgte elementene.

trans-unit.source: Collection of items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Samling av elementer som skal velges.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all items have been selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis alle elementer har blitt valgt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears all the selection in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle valget i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListBox"> </xref>.
